result.eng: That depends on a lot of things.
result.ga: braitheann sé sin ar go leor rudaí
result.orig: braitheann sé sin ar go leor rudaí
result.html: braitheann sé sin ar go leor rudaíThat depends on a lot of things.
result.ponchtml: braiṫeann sé sin ar go leor rudaíThat depends on a lot of things.

result.eng: Put those things in order according to size.
result.ga: cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.orig: cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.html: cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.
result.ponchtml: cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.

result.eng: However bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.
result.ga: dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárach
result.orig: dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárach
result.html: dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárachHowever bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: dá ḋonaċt rudaí inniu d'ḟéadfaidís ḃeiṫ níos measa amáraċHowever bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.

result.eng: There are many similarities between the two things.
result.ga: tá an-chuid cosúlachtaí idir an dá rud
result.orig: tá an-chuid cosúlachtaí idir an dá rud
result.html: tá an-chuid cosúlachtaí idir an dá rudThere are many similarities between the two things.
result.ponchtml: tá an-ċuid cosúlaċtaí idir an dá rudThere are many similarities between the two things.

result.ga: tá cúrsaí athraithe ó shin
result.orig: tá cúrsaí athraithe ó shin
result.html: tá cúrsaí athraithe ó shinThings have changed since then.
result.ponchtml: tá cúrsaí aṫraiṫe ó ẛinThings have changed since then.

result.ga: dia dhuit a dhónaill conas tá cúrsaí
result.orig: dia dhuit a dhónaill conas tá cúrsaí
result.html: dia dhuit a dhónaill conas tá cúrsaíHello, Dónall. How are things?
result.ponchtml: dia ḋuit a ḋónaill conas tá cúrsaíHello, Dónall. How are things?

result.eng: There are people who'd think the two things are related.
result.ga: táthar ann a cheapfadh go bhfuil baint idir an dá rud
result.orig: táthar ann a cheapfadh go bhfuil baint idir an dá rud
result.html: táthar ann a cheapfadh go bhfuil baint idir an dá rudThere are people who'd think the two things are related.
result.ponchtml: táṫar ann a ċeapfaḋ go ḃfuil baint idir an dá rudThere are people who'd think the two things are related.

result.eng: They moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ga: bhog siad go dtí an fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do ghiúdaigh na polainne
result.orig: bhog siad go dtí an fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do ghiúdaigh na polainne
result.html: bhog siad go dtí an fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do ghiúdaigh na polainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ponchtml: ḃog siad go dtí an ḟrainc mar is maiṫ a d'airiġ siad an ċontúirt a ḃí ann do ġiúdaiġ na polainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.

result.eng: Things were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.
result.ga: bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na naitsithe sa ghearmáin
result.orig: bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na naitsithe sa ghearmáin
result.html: bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na naitsithe sa ghearmáinThings were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.
result.ponchtml: ḃí cúrsaí contúirteaċ tar éis urġaḃáil ċuṁaċta na naitsiṫe sa ġearmáinThings were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.

result.eng: Be sensible and don't say such things.
result.ga: bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
result.orig: bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
result.html: bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eileBe sensible and don't say such things.
result.ponchtml: bíoḋ ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteaċt eileBe sensible and don't say such things.

result.eng: It is only now that things started to be bad in earnest.
result.ga: ba mhaith riamh é go dtí seo
result.orig: ba mhaith riamh é go dtí seo
result.html: ba mhaith riamh é go dtí seoIt is only now that things started to be bad in earnest.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁaiṫ riaṁ é go dtí seoIt is only now that things started to be bad in earnest.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: b'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.orig: b'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.html: b'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ponchtml: b'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
